events.title: The enemy reacted immediately to the capture of Ed...
events.description: The enemy reacted immediately to the capture of Ed Duda, Belhamed and Sidi Rezegh, and on the 27th November wireless messages for the enemy armoured divisions to return from the frontier were intercepted. Appreciating that the New Zealand Division,« ‘which had gone forward without its third

events.title: The enemy reacted immediately to the capture of Ed...
events.description: The enemy reacted immediately to the capture of Ed Duda, Belhamed and Sidi Rezegh, and on the 27th November wireless messages for the enemy armoured divisions to return from the frontier were intercepted. Appreciating that the New Zealand Division,« ‘which had gone forward without its third

events.title: On the 27th November enemy tanks, based on Bardia,...
events.description: On the 27th November enemy tanks, based on Bardia, captured the headquarters of the 5th New Zealand Infantry Brigade at Sidi Azeiz. Then, after two further attacks on Capuzzo, one of which was comparatively suc- cessful, the enemy armoured forces disappeared from the frontier area. By this time,most of them were already hurrying back to Sidi Rezegh in response to insistent calls for help.

events.title: On 27th November 1x Brigade occupied Tebourba and ...
events.description: On 27th November 1x Brigade occupied Tebourba and repulsed enemy counter-attacks “supported by tanks and dive-bombers, destroy- ing several tanks. On 28th November 11 Brigade and 2/13 Armoured Regiment were on the outskirts of Djedeida.

events.title: Be pleased to lay before Their Lordships the attac...
events.description: Be pleased to lay before Their Lordships the attached narrative of an engagement which took place on 27th November, 1940, during the execution of Operation ‘ “Collar”, between forces under my command and an Italian Naval force in the area to the South of Sardinia.

events.title: Points oF INTEREST. Enemy Intelligence prior to 27...
events.description: Points oF INTEREST. Enemy Intelligence prior to 27th November.

events.title: 18. So far as I am aware, reliance was placed enti...
events.description: 18. So far as I am aware, reliance was placed entirely on shore based air reconnaissance to locate the position of enemy units in the Western Mediterranean prior to 27th November. This reconnaissance proved quite inadequate for the purpose- and there was insufficient information concerning the location of Italian naval forces prior to the-27th November and no report of enemy ships being at sea in the Western Medi- terranean until they were sighted by carrier re- connaissance a.m. 27th November.

events.title: Sunrise on the 27th November was at 0824 (zone. + ...
events.description: Sunrise on the 27th November was at 0824 (zone. + 2) and at’ 0800 ° the situation was as follows: —
